mapper.select: SELECT board_id, subject, title, writer, write_date, is_answered, file_path FROM qna_board WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY write_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board (board_id, subject, title, content, writer, write_date, file_path) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{subject}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{writeDate}, '' #{filePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_board SET subject = #{subject}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file_path = '' file_path = #{filePath} WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
